meanings.definition: A person who is being tested or experimented on.
meanings.sent1: The students were the testees in the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: The doctors conducted a study with the testees to gather data.
meanings.sent3: The testees in the lab were eager to see the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Being a testee in the research project felt like being a volunteer for a noble cause.
meanings.sent5: The testees' feedback was crucial for the success of the trial.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment that covers the male genitals.
meanings.sent1: The boxer briefs had a comfortable pouch for the testees.
meanings.sent2: The swim trunks had a lining to protect the testees while swimming.
meanings.sent3: The designer added extra padding to the testees area for added comfort.
meanings.sent4: The athlete adjusted his shorts to ensure the testees were secure during the game.
meanings.sent5: The protective cup shielded the testees from any impact during the match.
